name: Next Key When?
description: Shows how many orbs you have towards your next demon key!

show-on-garage.name: Show on Icon Kit
show-on-garage.description: Show the count in the Icon Kit

show-on-pause.name: Show on Pause
show-on-pause.description: Show the count on the Pause Menu

show-on-orbs.name: Show on Orb Increase
show-on-orbs.description: Show the count when you gain Orbs

show-on-end-screen.name: Show on End Screen
show-on-end-screen.description: Show the count on the End Screen
